## <i class="fas fa-comment"></i> Upcoming talks

<ul>
```{r upcoming-talks, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = "asis"}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(glue)
df <- readxl::read_xlsx("../cv/data/work-records.xlsx", "talks") %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>% 
  arrange(date) %>% 
  filter(date > Sys.Date(),
         advertised=="yes") %>% 
  select(date, title, host, rego_url) 
if(nrow(df)) {
  glue_data(df, '<li>{title}<div style="font-size:0.8em;">[<i>{host}</i>]({rego_url})</div><div style="font-size:0.8em;">{date}</div></li>')
} else {
  cat("I have no advertised upcoming talks. Please feel free to [invite me](mailto:emi.tanaka@monash.edu) for a talk if I do something of your interest. You can find some of my past talks [here](https://emitanaka.org/talks/).")
}
```
</ul>
